  • Method Details

    • getServerSock

      public ServerSock getServerSock()

    • setServerSock

      public void setServerSock(ServerSock s)

    • createNewGame

      public boolean createNewGame(String nickname, int numOfPlayers) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to create a new instance of game (if there isn't one already running) with numOfPlayers players and then add to the game the player who created the game (nickname). Calls serverRMI method gameIsCreated to notify every waiting ClientRMI that a game has been created
      Parameters:
      nickname - name of the player who is creating the game
      numOfPlayers - number of players that can join the game
      Returns:
      true if the game is created correctly, false if there is already a game running
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • joinGame

      public int joinGame(String nickname)
      this method is used to add a player to the game with the name "nickname"
      Parameters:
      nickname - name of the player to add to the game
      Returns:
      a numerical code representing the outcome of the operation (-1) if there is not any game to join (-2) if the game has already started (0) if the player joined the game correctly

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String nick)
      Removes player with nickname nick from playersList and leaderBoard when client disconnects before game has started. Should only be called if game hasn't started.

    • hasGameStarted

      public boolean hasGameStarted()
      this method is used to check if the game has already started
      Returns:
      true if the game has already started, false otherwise

    • hasGameBeenCreated

      public boolean hasGameBeenCreated()
      Returns:
      true if first player has successfully joined and created a game

    • getMyShelf

      public Tile[][] getMyShelf(String playerNickname)
      This method is used to get a copy of the shelf of the player with name "playerNickname" to send to the client so that it can be displayed
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - name of the player who is requesting the display of his shelf
      Returns:
      a Tile matrix representing the current state of the Shelf of the player, null if the game hasn't started yet

    • getTilePlacingSpot

      public TilePlacingSpot[][] getTilePlacingSpot()
      This method is used to get a copy of the board to send it to the client so that it can be displayed
      Returns:
      null if the game hasn't started yet, a matrix o TilePlacingSpot representing the current state of the board if the game has started

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      This method is used to get a copy of the board

    • isMyTurn

      public boolean isMyTurn(String playerNickname)
      This method tells if the player with name "playerNickname" is the one who is playing the turn currently
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - name of the player
      Returns:
      true if it's playerNickname turn, false otherwise

    • getNameOfPlayerWhoIsCurrentlyPlaying

      public String getNameOfPlayerWhoIsCurrentlyPlaying()
      This method is used to get the name of the player who is currently playing the turn
      Returns:
      the name of the player who is currently playing its turn if the game has started, null otherwise

    • getCommonGoalCard1Description

      public String getCommonGoalCard1Description()
      this method is used to get the description of the first common goal card of the game
      Returns:
      the description of the first common goal card if the game has started, null otherwise

    • getCommonGoalCard2Description

      public String getCommonGoalCard2Description()
      this method is used to get the description of the second common goal card of the game
      Returns:
      the description of the second common goal card if the game has started, null otherwise

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints(String playerNickname)
      this method is used to get the actual points of the player with the name "playerNickname"
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - name of the player who is requesting his points
      Returns:
      0 if the game hasn't started or if the playerNickname is not one of the players in the game, otherwise it returns the points of the player

    • drawFromBoard

      public List<Tile> drawFromBoard(String playerNickname, int x, int y, int amount, Board.Direction direction)
      This method is used to draw tiles from the board
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the name of the player doing this action
      x - the x coordinate of the first tile to draw
      y - the y coordinate of the first tile to draw
      amount - the amount of tile to draw
      direction - the direction in which to draw the tiles
      Returns:
      null if the action is called by a player who is not currently the one who is playing its turn or if the move is not valid if everything is ok it returns the list of tiles drawn by the player

    • insertTilesInShelf

      public boolean insertTilesInShelf(String playerNickname, List<Tile> tiles, int column)
      This method is used to insert the tiles drawn from the board into the shelf
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the name of the player doing this action
      tiles - the list of tiles to insert into the shelf
      column - the column of the shelf into which the tiles must be put
      Returns:
      the outcome of the operation, true if everything is ok, false if the move was not valid or if the player calling thi is not the one playing the current turn

    • checkIfCommonGoalN1IsFulfilled

      public boolean checkIfCommonGoalN1IsFulfilled(String playerNickname)
      this method is used to check if the player with the name "playerNickname" has completed the first common goal
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the name of a player
      Returns:
      false if the name of the player is not the one of the player who is currently playing its turn or if the player has not completed the first common goal, true if the player has completed the first common goal

    • checkIfCommonGoalN2IsFulfilled

      public boolean checkIfCommonGoalN2IsFulfilled(String playerNickname)
      this method is used to check if the player with the name "playerNickname" has completed the second common goal
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the name of a player
      Returns:
      false if the name of the player is not the one of the player who is currently playing its turn or if the player has not completed the second common goal, true if the player has completed the second common goal

    • endOfTurn

      public void endOfTurn(String playerNickname)
      This method is used to end the turn, only if the playerNickname is the same of the one of the player who is currently playing its tur
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the name of the player who calls this action

    • hasTheGameEnded

      public boolean hasTheGameEnded()
      this method is used to check if the game has ended
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise

    • getLeaderboard

      public List<Player> getLeaderboard()
      this method is used to get the leaderboard
      Returns:
      a list of players representing the leaderboard if the game has started, null otherwise

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn()
      this method is called to perform the turn dynamic in the gameplay.

    • endGame

      public void endGame() throws IOException
      calls game.endGame() to set endGame to true and notifies RMI and Socket Clients through serverRMI and serverSock methods
      Throws:
      IOException

    • disconnectionEndGame

      public void disconnectionEndGame(String nicknameOfRemainingPlayer)
      Ends the game due to all but one player disconnecting.

    • getMyPersonalCard

      public Tile[][] getMyPersonalCard(String playerNickname)
      this method is used to get the personal goal card for the specified player
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - name of the specified player
      Returns:
      null if there isn't any player with the name "playerNickname", if there is a player with that name returns its personal goal card

    • saveGameProgress

      public void saveGameProgress()
      This method has been made public for testing purposes

    • loadGameProgress

      public boolean loadGameProgress()
      loads GameProgress.json in game if it exists in the directory
      Returns:
      true if GameProgress.json exists and is loaded or false otherwise

    • deleteProgress

      public void deleteProgress()
      This method is used to delete a GameProgress.json file if it exists

    • checkForSavedGameProgress

      public boolean checkForSavedGameProgress()
      This method checks if GameProgress.json is present in this path

    • getPGCmap

      public Map<Integer,PersonalGoalCard> getPGCmap()

    • getPGC

      public PersonalGoalCard getPGC(String playerNickname)
      Get the personal Goal Card of a player with the nickname passed in as parameter
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - nickname of the player
      Returns:
      PersonalGoalCard of a given player

    • getCommonGoalCards

      public List<CommonGoalCard> getCommonGoalCards()

    • getScoringToken

      public List<ScoringToken> getScoringToken(String playerNickname)
      this method is used to get the scoring tokens possessed by a player
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - name of the player
      Returns:
      the list of scoring token of the player if the nickname correspond to the one of a player in the game, null otherwise

    • getAvailableScoringTokens

      public List<ScoringToken> getAvailableScoringTokens(CommonGoalCard commonGoalCard)
      this method is used to get the scoring tokens of the common goal card passed in the parameter
      Parameters:
      commonGoalCard - the common goal card of which we want the scoring tokens
      Returns:
      the scoring token of the common goal card if commonGoalCard correspond to one of the common goal cards present in the game null otherwise

    • getGamePlayerListNickname

      public List<String> getGamePlayerListNickname()
      Returns:
      a List of String with the nickname of the Players in Game

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      This method is used to get the Game and is meant to be used for testing purposes only.

      public String getFirstPlayer()
      Returns:
      the nickname of the player with firstPlayerSeat

    • hasEndgameToken

      public boolean hasEndgameToken(String nickname)
      This method is used to check if a player has endGameToken
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player
      Returns:
      true if the player with the given nickname has endGameToken, false otherwise
